ARABIC: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Produce it then if you are someone telling the truth.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The Pharaoh) said: "Then bring it, if you speak the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said: "Then bring it if you are truthful at all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh replied, "Bring it, if you are telling the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun, “Then bring it, if you are of the truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Bring it forth then, if you are of the truthful!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Said he: Bring it then, if you are of the truthful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Bring it then, if thou art of the truthful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pharaoh) said: Produce it then, if thou art of the truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh said, "Show it then, if you are telling the truth!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Fir'awn said: forth with it then, if thou art of the truth- tellers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Then bring it, should you be truthful.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Pharaoh) said: "Show it then, if thou tellest the truth!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "Bring it forth then, if you are of the truthful!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Pharaoh) replied: 'Show us your sign, if you are of the truthful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Bring it, if you are being truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:31] He, Pharaoh, said, to him: ‘Then bring it, if you are truthful’, in this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Pharaoh) said: Produce it then) Moses, (if thou art of the Truthful) that you are a Messenger to me and to my people!
